Choose Final Point by Surrogate Mean

Source: R/result_by_surrogate_design.R
result_by_surrogate_design.Rd

Choose final point by best surrogate mean prediction on all evaluated points.

result_by_surrogate_design(instance, optimizer_mbo)

Arguments

instance

(bbotk::OptimInstanceSingleCrit | bbotk::OptimInstanceMultiCrit)
The bbotk::OptimInstance the result should be assigned to.

optimizer_mbo

(OptimizerMbo)
The OptimizerMbo that generates the final result.

Contents
